title: My Faith or My Family
description: In My Faith or My Family, you will hear the astonishing testimony of Jean-Paul Tiendrebeogo, an African orphan who was rejected by his own family and forced to flee for his life because of his faith in Jesus Christ. Not knowing where to go or what would happen to him, he found himself in a strange city, where he was eventually adopted by an American couple who showed him the power of God's love.Read this incredible testimony of how God turned a young boy's sorrow into great joy.
author: Jean-Paul Tiendrebeogo
